thread.title: Cooking And Baking With Marijuana: 8 incredible pot-infused recipes that'll get you baked | Mic
thread.title_full: Cooking And Baking With Marijuana: 8 incredible pot-infused recipes that'll get you baked | Mic

title: Cooking And Baking With Marijuana: 8 incredible pot-infused recipes that'll get you baked | Mic
text:
Who said cooking with weed couldn't be sophisticated? These extra special hors d'oeuvres will both wow and satisfy your party guests. Just make sure you let them in on the special ingredient first. Get the recipe here . Mario Batali's double-chocolate pot brownies Mario Batali's brownies Source: Food52 
Yes, that Mario Batali, orange Crocs and all, shared his super chocolatey infused brownies recipe in honors of the Denver Broncos playing in the Super Bowl in 2016. Get the recipe here . Pot hot chocolate Source: Shutterstock 
Move over red wine hot chocolate , this infused cocoa is a new way to adultify the cozy winter beverage. Get the recipe here . Cannabis spaghetti sauce Source: Shutterstock 
Cannabis oil and cannabutter come together in this slow-cooked spaghetti sauce that will make pasta night so much more chill. You can also spice up a jar of Prego if you're not feeling the whole homemade thing. Get the recipe here . Marijuana infused blueberry banana smoothie with hemp protein Marijuana infused blueberry banana smoothie with hemp protein Source: Shutterstock 
Mornings just got so much better with this easy to make — and healthy! — infused smoothie. Get the recipe here . Cannabis infused honey Source: Shutterstock 
›The beauty of this honey recipe is that it's so versatile. You can drizzle the honey on toasty bread or apples or serve it on a cheese plate or just lick it off your fingers when you're craving a special treat. Get the recipe here . Like us on Facebook:
